name: 9 Lives (VictorDeno)
description:
9 Lives was made for the GDTV 2022 game jam, had a lot of fun learning and challenging myself to make everything from scratch except for the music and sounds. Hopefully this will be the first of many games to come :)

2- 5 minute playtime.

  • No copyrighted music in game ( All sounds are CC0 from freesounds.org ) 
  • WASD movement
  • E to Interact
  • X to Quit
  • R to Restart Level

    Game is made with Unreal Engine 4.27
    Source is included
